H0.text: Gray is the color of light produced when all of the colors of visible light in the electromagnetic spectrum are combined.

H1.text: White is the color of light produced when all colors of visible light in the electromagnetic spectrum are combined.

H2.text: Black is the color produced when all colors of visible light in the electromagnetic spectrum are combined.

H3.text: Brown is the color of light produced when all colors of visible light in the electromagnetic spectrum are combined.

A4.text: Newton discovered that prisms could disassemble and reassemble white light, and described the phenomenon in his book Opticks.
